HERO.DESCRIPTION: A future vision driven by Artificial Intelligence in Arabic

ABOUT.TITLE: RQM Story
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: How We Started?
ABOUT.DESC_1: RQM launched as a specialized technology company to support government entities and the business sector in building a reliable digital ecosystem based on Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity, and Digital Infrastructure.
ABOUT.DESC_2: We focus on providing practical, applicable solutions that improve operational efficiency, reduce risks, and support business continuity in a data-driven environment.
ABOUT.DESC_3: Through a national engineering team and operational expertise in government and private projects, we design and implement digital business solutions with clearly measurable impact, building long-term partnerships that make RQM a trusted partner in the digital future journey.

MESSAGE_VALUE.VISION_DESC: To lead a smarter and safer digital future through technologies and infrastructure that create an effective impact on business efficiency and sustainability.
MESSAGE_VALUE.MESSAGE_DESC: We provide advanced digital solutions that enable businesses to raise operational efficiency, enhance security, and support decision-making with high reliability.

DUTY.TITLE: Our Mission
DUTY.SUBTITLE: We keep these goals in mind to achieve our vision
DUTY.CARD_1_DESC: Designing and implementing digital solutions that serve a real need and achieve a clear return on investment.
DUTY.CARD_2_DESC: Using automation and artificial intelligence to improve workflows, reduce errors, and cut costs.
DUTY.CARD_3_DESC: Local data centers and cloud solutions that support business continuity and provide high availability.
DUTY.CARD_4_TITLE: Aligning Global Trends with Local Market
DUTY.CARD_4_DESC: Following the latest global technologies and applying what suits the regulatory and economic environment in the Kingdom and the region.

PARTNER.TITLE: Your Sustainable Success Partner
PARTNER.SUBTITLE: Competitive advantages that enhance your business efficiency
PARTNER.CARD_1_DESC: A national team with advanced expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity, Cloud Systems, and Digital Transformation—supporting you with real operational knowledge, not just theoretical consulting.
PARTNER.CARD_2_DESC: Integrated solutions based on the latest standards of digital infrastructure, encryption, and data governance, ensuring the stability of your services and business continuity.
PARTNER.CARD_3_DESC: All systems and services are hostable within the Kingdom in compliance with local regulations, with the ability to deploy on cloud or local environments as needed.
PARTNER.CARD_4_DESC: We adopt agile methodologies that enable us to adapt quickly to your needs and market changes, ensuring continuous improvement at every stage of work.
PARTNER.CARD_5_DESC: Precise operational management led by specialized project and account managers to ensure projects are executed with high efficiency and delivered according to the highest standards.
PARTNER.CARD_6_TITLE: Professional Technical Support and Continuous Service
PARTNER.CARD_6_DESC: We provide professional support channels and continuous operational monitoring to ensure your solutions are ready and your team and end client are satisfied.
